etymology.description: Depicts a footprint pointing downward -> variant form of 夂(夂) (zhǐ, 'footprint pointing down')
etymology.interpretation: The character 夊(suī, 'downward foot') is a pictogram showing the shape of a footprint pointing down. It is a variant form of 夂(夂) (zhǐ, 'footprint pointing down'), distinguished by its simplified representation. These visual representations emphasize the direction of movement associated with footprints, which is a common theme in ancient character forms.
